      Chorus: Dindu Dindu Dindu………………

 5. Engoma  n’omugaabe mukube,            Chorus: Tufunyhe obulamu.
    N’owomuzira oyo ateeku.                     Chorus: Tufunyhe obulamu.                                                           
    Twanirize Musengwa Kabaka,             Chorus: Tufunyhe obulamu.
    Tusanyhukire Yezu Kabaka oyo gwetufunyhe.. Tufunyhe obulamu.

Chorus: Dindu Dindu Dindu………………

hymns.title: I AM THE BREAD OF LIFE
hymns.content:
1. I am the bread of life
He who comes to me shall not hunger
He who believes in me shall not thirst
No one must come to me
Unless the Father draw him
Chorus: And I will raise him up x 3
On the last day

2. The bread that I will give
Is my flesh for the life of the world
And he who eats of this bread
He shall live for ever
He shall live for ever
Chorus: And I will raise him up x 3
On the last day

3. Unless you eat
Of the flesh of the Son of Man
And drink of his blood
And drink of his blood
You shall not have life in you.
Chorus: And I will raise him up x 3
On the last day

4. I am the resurrection
And I am the Life
He who believes in me
He may indeed rejoice
He shall live for ever

Chorus: And I will raise him up x 3
On the last day

Chorus: And I will raise him up x 3
On the last day

hymns.title: MUJJE TUFUNE EKISONYIWO
hymns.content:
Chorus: Mujje mujje mwe
Atuyita tufune ekisonyiwo x 2
1. Mujje Omugaati
Ogw’Obulamu yatuyita
Chorus: Mujje mujje mwe ........... x 1

2. Mujje tulye omubiri gwe,
N’omusaayi gwe tugunywe ffe.

3. Omusaayi gwe gwayiibwa,
Ebibi by’abangi bisonyiyibwe.

4. Endwadde azituwonya,
N’obutafa n’abutuwa.

5. Obulamu obutagwaawo
Obubwe ddala abutuwa.

6. Ku lw’oluvanyuma alizukiza
Bonna abo abamulya

7. Tumubeeramu n’atubeeramu,
Katonda oyo nnyini bulamu.

hymns.title: MUJJE TUMULYE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Mujje tumulye Yezu Kabaka,
Ye ggwe Mugaati ogw’omu ggulu,
Ogutuwa ffe obulamu,
Obwo mubiri n’obwo mwoyo

1. Tulye Omugaati Ogw’obulamu,
Ye Yezu Kabaka ddala ddala,
Oyo eyatonda byonna byonna,
Nnyini buyinza n’obulamu.

2. Mujje mumanye nga bwawooma,
Katonda waffe atwagala,
Ajja tumulye atujjeko,
Ekikolimo ekyo kufa.

3. Ab’endwadde ezo ezitawona
Mulye Omugaati Ogw’obulamu
Buli agulyako tiwakufa
Aba mulamu ennaku zonna.

4. Kasokedde ffe tulya mmere,
Tutuuse ffe ku mmere ddala;
Ewonya endwadde n’enjala
Anti ye nyama ye gy’ atuwa.

5. Okwagala kwa Yezu Kabaka
Kusukiridde n’amagezi;
Bwetumulya ffe atubeeramu
Netuba balamu ku bubwe!

hymns.title: MWESUNGA KI
hymns.content:
2x{     Chorus:  Otyo, otyo, otyo        Ekidd: Mwesunga ki?
  	                     Otyo                           Ekidd: Mutukobere banaife,                                       
                                                                              mwesunga ki?  

1. Tujja kufuna ku bulamu              Ekidd: Imwe! Munabufuna wa?
    Tujja kulya Mugaati                      Ekidd: Mbawe ogwo gwakika ki?!
    Omugaati  ogw’obulamu             Ekidd: Bana ng’ogwo tiguidhi?!
    No’mwaana wa Kibbumba          Ekidd: Ighwe seeta onkobere.

Chorus:  Otyo, otyo, otyo ………………. x 2  .

2. Muna olumulyaku oti                       Ekidd: Imwe! kiki ekibaawo?
    Ezira alikubika mu nsi                      Ekidd: Banna ng’ekyo kiyaka!                      
    Ogibamu nga osagamba                 Ekidd: Imwe kooti nsituke.
    Endwaire edho nga lugero               Ekidd: Imwe kooti naabe.

Chorus:  Otyo, otyo, otyo ………………. x 2

3. Akwedhereza ebibi byo                     Ekidd: Imwe ngekyo Kirungi
    Muna waba mu Kibbumba                Ekidd: Imwe tunagulya li?
    Yenna ati yakubaamu                        Ekidd: Bana timugundyaku. 
    Ku lulwe waba mulamu                     Ekidd: Imwe mukole tulye!!

Chorus:  Otyo, otyo, otyo ………………. x 3

hymns.title: NKUSINZE NTYA NKWAGALE NTYA
hymns.content:
1. Nkusinze ntya, nze nno nkwagale ntya?
Ayi Omugaati Ogw’obulamu!
Nkwebaze ntya, ayi Katonda;
Ozze omwange n’ompa n’obulamu
Obubwo!
Nsanyuse, nkwaniriza,
Ayi Kabaka afuga e ggulu n’ensi.

2. Olubadde okulya ku nnyama yo,
Era nenywa ne ku musaayi gwo,
Nze onsonyiye ebibi byonna,
N’ontukuza, n’onzijjamu
Nze nno, omwolo!
Nsanyuse, nkwaniriza,
Ayi Kabaka afuga e ggulu n’ensi.

3. Ayi Katonda ozze okunzijjako,
Endwadde zzonna ezabuli kika.
N’ekikolimo ekyo eky’okufa;
Nkweyanze ntya,Ggwe onjagadde bwotyo,
Kabaka!
Nsanyuse, nkwaniriza,
Ayi Kabaka afuga e ggulu n’ensi.

4. Nnajula ki nze nno, ayi Kabaka,
Nga ndi mu ggwe, ate nga naawe ondimu!
Nga nzijjudde n’obulamu bwo,
Obutagwaawo, teri kinnanganga,
Nkwebaza.
Nsanyuse, nkwaniriza,
Ayi Kabaka afuga e ggulu n’ensi.

5. Ndi mutuuze mu nsi ne mu ggulu,
Anti nfunye kadi ey’embaga yo,
Eyo mu ggulu eyo gyotuwa,
Ffe abaana bo abakulyako ggwe,
Kabaka.
Nsanyuse, nkwaniriza,
Ayi Kabaka afuga e ggulu n’ensi.

hymns.title: NKWEBAZA YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka Ggwe Katonda wange
Nkwebaza nnyo olw’okunjagala
Ebibi byange mbiraba nga bingi
Nkusaba onsasire nze omwononyi

2. Ozze omwange Ggwe Katonda wange
Okunjuna nfune obulamu
N’ekisonyiwo ekye bibi byange
Ndyoke nsanire okukusinza

3. Bwenfunye enyama yo Mukama wange
N’omusaayi gwo Yezu Kabaka
Ye Ggwe emmere ddala ffe gyetulya
Neyanziza nnyo okujja omwange

4. Kabaka nkwebaza olw’ekisa kyo
Olwo kunjagala nze omwolo
Nkusaba mbeere mu ssanyu lyo ku nsi
Era ndi sanyuka okujja ewuwo.

hymns.title: OMUGAATI OGW’OBULAMU TUGULYENGA BULIJJO
hymns.content:
Chorus: Omugaati ogw’obulamu,
Tugulyenga bulijjo,
Ye Katonda atagwawo.

1. Omugaati Ogw’Obulamu,
Naagubatendera ntya?!
Anti ye Katonda mwene,
Gwe tulya natubaamu!

2. Oluba okugulyako,
Osonyiyibwa ebibi!
Nekikolimo eky’okufa,
Nakyo akikujjako!

3. Akuwonya n’endwadde zo,
Obeewo oleme kufa!
Mu mubiri akuwa obulamu,
Nobaawo nga tolwala!

4. Kino nze nakilojja ntya?
Omukwano mwajjira!
Kabaka akuwa obulamu,
Obubwe obutagwaawo!

5. Alizukiza n’ababe
Abo abaamulyako!
Baliba batemagana,
Bagenda ku mbaga ye!

6. Wulira gano amakula,
Katonda okumubamu!
Atenga naye akulimu,
Ng’oli mulamu ku bubwe!

7. Kabaka nkwaniriza nnyo,
Mirembe ayi Kabaka
Nkwebaza okwagala kwo,
N’otuwa amakula go!

hymns.title: TUGULUMIZE OMUGAATI OGW’OBULAMU
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ayi Katonda Ogulumizibwe,
Kitaffe, Mwaana, Mwoyo Mutukirivu,
Olw’okutwagala ennyo n’otuwa Omugati
Ogw’obulamu.

1. Tugulumize Omugaati Ogw’Obulamu,
Tugukirize, tugusinze, tugutendereze,
Era tugwagalenga nnyo emirembe gyonna;
Olw’okutusonyiwa ebibi byaffe,
Negututukuza,
Netubeera mugwo nagwo negutubeeramu,
Tugwebaza.

2. Tugulumize Omugaati Ogw’Obulamu,
Tugukirize, tugusinze, tugutendereze,
Era tugwagalenga nnyo emirembe gyonna;
Olw’okujjawo ekikolimo eky’okufa,
N’egutuwonya endwadde eza buli kika,
Negutujjuza obulamu,
Tugwebaza.

3. Tugulumize Omugaati Ogw’Obulamu,
Tugukirize, tugusinze, tugutendereze,
Era tugwagalenga nnyo emirembe gyonna;
Olw’okwanukula essaala zaffe,
Negutuyisa mu bizibu by’ensi,
Era n’egutuwa emirembe n’essanyu,
Tugwebaza.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA TUKUSINZA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka tukusinza
Tukutenda, tukwagala
Era tukugulumiza,
Kubanga ye gwe Katonda.

2. Yezu Kabaka gwe mugaati
Ogutuwa obulamu
Buli yenna agulyako
Talifa nga bajajja ffe.

3. Teri mmere mu nsi yonna
Esinga omubiri gwe
Era teri mu by’okunywa
Ekisinga omusaayi gwe

4. Nga tulidde enyama ye
Netunywa n’omusaayi gwe
Atuwonya zonna endwadde
Natusonyiwa n’ebibi.

5. Obulamu obutagwaawo
Abuwa abo abamulya
Era kulw’oluvanyuma
Alibazukiza bonna

6. Tukwebaza obwetowaze
Bwolina Yezu Kabaka
Gwe Katonda ow’obuyinza
Okujja n’otubeeramu.

hymns.title: AMATEEKA AGASINGA OBUKULU
hymns.content:
1. Omukama Katonda omwagalanga n’omutima gwonna,
N’omwoyo gwo gwonna era n’emmeeme yo yonna.
Ery’okubiri, oyagalanga munno,
Nga bweweyagala nnyini.

2. Mu mateeka ago, mwe musibuka etteeka lyonna.
N’ebya abalanzi abo, byonna bizingirwa mu ago.
Obutukuvu, emirembe n’essanyu,
Bisibuka mu ago gombi.

3. Omukama Katonda waffe tumwagale nnyo.
Okukira abazadde, abaana, wadde omubeezi,
N’emibiri era n’ebyobugagga.
Nebirala yabisinga.

4. Yezu Kabaka, ye Katonda waffe ddala mwene.
Tumukulembezenga mu buli kyetukola;
Mu kwogera n’emu kulowooza okwo,
Mu byonna tulabenga ye.

5. Tulekere awo obusungu n’okuwalagana.
Kyeweyagaliza kikolerenga ne munno.
Tugabane Katonda byatuwadde,
Toleka munno kudaaga

hymns.title: EMPEERA Y’OKWAGALA
hymns.content:
1. Mu kusooka Yezu Kabaka,
Omuntu ya mutonda,
Mu kifananyi kye ddala,
Era nga baagalana.
Nnamussa ne mu nnimiro
Eyali nga ejjudde,
Buli kyonna kye yetaaga
Aleme kukazana.

2. Nga omuti ogw’obulamu
Gwaali mu eyo ennimiro
Omuntu oyo agulyengako
Abeerewo nga tafa.
Era n’amuwa okufuga,
Ebitonde ebyo mu nsi,
Era nga Katonda ajja,
Nebanyumya n’omuntu.

3. Naye omuntu olw’okwagala,
Okwenkana Katonda,
Yalya ekibala kyo muti,
Gwe baali bamugaanye.
Naagobebwa mu nnimiro
Era naakolimirwa,
Okuva olwo nga wakufa
N’okubonabonanga.

4. Omuntu n’eyeyongera,
Okusobya Katonda,
Obutemu n’obuseegu
Bya labika wo mu nsi.
N’ebisiyaga ebyo byajja,
Ensi eno n’esabulwa,
Naye omuntu nga tafaayo,
Yeyongera kwoonona.

5. Yezu Kabaka n’asalawo
Okujja atununule
Era n’assawo ebirabo
Ebya yenna amwagala.
Azzaawo omukwaano ogwaliwo
Bw’okwaata ebiragiro,
Wamu n’ebigambo byonna ,
Byeyatuyigiriza.

6. Ekiva mu ku bikwaata,
Ebigambo bye bino,
Yegayirira Kitaawe,
Akuwe oyo Mwoyo we.
Mwagalana ne Kitaawe
Ne Mwaana n’akwagala
Era Mwaana olw’omukwaano
Ajja n’akweyoleka.

7. Wulira n’ekyessanyu ennyo
Bw’okwaata ebigambo bye
Mwaana wamu ne Kitaawe,
Bakutebenkeramu.
Emirembe n’emirembe
Katonda akubeeramu
Kitaffe, Mwaana ne Mwoyo
Oyo Omuwolereza

hymns.title: NG’OTWAGALA! NG’OTWAGALA!
hymns.content:
1. Ng’otwagala! Watutonda ffenna
Mu kifananyi kyo – n’otuwa n’ensi
Ng’otwagala! Ne bwe twakusobya
Tewatwabulira - watununula.

Chorus: Ng’otwagala! Ng’otwagala!
Ensulo y’okwagala etakoma.

2. Ng’otwagala! Twali mu nzikiza
N’otuyigiriza - ebya mazima.
Ng’otwagala! Mugaati Omulamu
Otuwonya endwadde - n’otubeeramu!

Chorus: Ng’otwagala! Ng’otwagala!...........

3.Ng’otwagala! Nabuli olukya
Otugabirira - n’otusonyiwa!
Ng’otwagala! Wobeera mu ggulu!
Woyagala naffe - tubeere naawe!

Chorus: Ng’otwagala! Ng’otwagala!.............

hymns.title: TUMWAGALE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Tumwagale Yezu Kabaka
Eyajja mu nsi
Natuyigiriza ebigambo
Okuva ewa Patri.

1. Tumwagale eyatutonda
Olww’okujja bulijjo,
Ne tumulya ng’Omugaati
Ogw’obulamu.

2. Tumwagale eyatugamba
“Nze Musumba Omulungi,
Awaayo obulamu bwe,
Olw’endiga ze.

3. Tumwagale era tumwesige,
Kuba yazukira,
Natulaga nti,
Ye yebesaawo.

4. Tumwagale eyatugamba
Engeri gyetulina,
Okusabamu Kitaawe
Atubeseewo.

5. Tumwagale era tumwebaze
Yatuyigiriza,
Engeri gye tumusinzaamu
Kuba ye Kabaka.

6. Tumwagale Yezu Kabaka
Ne Kitaawe,
Olw’okutuwa Mwoyo
Owa Mazima.

hymns.title: BANANGE NKOLE NTYA ERA MUWE KI
hymns.content:
1. Banange nkole ntya?
Banange muwe ki oyo Kabaka omulungi?
Chorus: Eeeeeeeh!
Anti mulabe by’ankoledde
Chorus: Fuba okole Yezu Kabaka byakugamba,
Ye Mununuzi.

2. Nali nsinza bantu, Sitaani omujeemu, ne bifananyi ebyo
Nze namanyisa ekituufu.
Okuva mu buto bwange nga nkiwulira naye nga sikifaako
Katonda gwetulina okusinza.

3. Nga bwe nsoma bayibuli olusi ntabuka nesimanya kituufu;
Nze nansiba ku by’Abatume.
Abo be babe, b’eyatuma nabawa ne Mwoyo Mutukirivu
Bye baawandiika bitufu.

4. Nga nsinza bafu, bano batukirivu bampolereze nze.
Nze nandaga Mwoyo Mutukirivu.
Oyo y’ Omuyigiriza, Omukubagiza era Omuwolereza waffe
Muve ku Batukirivu.

5. Nali mulwadde awedde, omwoyo gubuze, nga ntubidde mu bibi nze.
Nze nampa Omugaati Ogw’obulamu.
Ebintu byennina, n’obulamu buno, byonna ye yabimpa.
Nze mwebaza butakoma.

Ye Mununuzi, ab’oluganda ye Mutonzi.
Yezu Kabaka Kitaffe oyo

Gwe Mugaati, Ogw’Obulamu, gwe mugaati
Ogujjawo olumbe!

Ye Musumba, Omulungi, ye Musumba
Alokola endiga ze.

hymns.title: KATONDA WANGE OMWAGALWA
hymns.content:
1. Katonda wange omwagalwa,
Nkusinze ntya, nkwagale ntya?!
Gwe anjagala obutakoma;
Bwotyo nompa ekitangaala

Nazaalibwa mu nsi ejjudde
Enzikiza wonna.
Ssaalina kalungi konna,
Akansanyiza okwagala kwo.

2. Nkwebaze obulamu bwompa,
Ssaako amaanyi n’amagezi.
Wanfunira ne wensula,
N’emmere eyo ompa bulijjo.
Omponyeza endwadde nyingi,
Zenfunye olw’ebibi.
Yezu Kabaka n’onsasira,
N’onsonyiwa era n’omponya.

3. Nebaza nate obukuumi
Nga ntawuka ku mirimu
Ate ekiro n’ompumuza
Nga tewali kintawanya.

Bulijjo ongabirira,
Ombudabuda, Taata.
Ompanirira, onsomesa,
Ebigambo byo, ntuuke gyoli

hymns.title: TUKWEBAZA KABAKA ABUKESEZA
hymns.content:
CHROUS :
Suprano: Kabaka!
Hossana Alleluia,
Suprano: Kabaka!
Hossana Alleluia,
Suprano: Alleluia!
Mirembe Ayi Kabaka
Suprano: Kabaka!
Tusanyuse obukeseza.

1. Abaana abo mubi ekiro
Begirisa, banyaga,
Baseegula, batta, babba, Kabaka
Tusula nno kubukenke.

CHROUS : Kabaka..........

2. N’endwadde ezituluma,Kabaka
Zeyongera nnyo ekiro,
Era bangi batwalibwa, Kabaka
Twebaza okubukeesa.

CHROUS: Kabaka........

3. Tusaba obe naffe, Kabaka
Otutaase, otubeere
N’emirimu tugikole, Kabaka
Nga tukwesiga mu byonna.

CHROUS: Kabaka.......

hymns.title: TUMWEBAZE YEZU KABAKA OMUNUNUZI
hymns.content:
1. Tumwebaze nnyo Katonda
Eyatufirira
Yezu Kabaka ow’obuyinza
Eyatulokola
Eyajja munsi ku lwaffe
Okutununula
Ffena twali mu nzikiza
Ekitangaala najja.

2. Tumwebaze Yezu Kabaka
Atuwa obulamu
Natuwa n’ekisonyiwo
Eky’ebibi byaffe
Tumuyimbire n’essanyu
Kuba ye Kabaka
Era yalina obuyinza
Mu nsi ne mu ggulu.

3. Tusinze Yezu Kabaka
Katonda Kitaffe
Watuwonya omuliro
Ogw’oluberera
Twali tusinza bitonde
N’ebyo ebifananyi
Nojja notuyigiriza
Wekka gwe osinzibwa

4. Tukwebaza ebigambo
Byotuyigiriza
Abantu bonna abo mu nsi
Babiwulirenga
Tukusaba otuyambe
Okubikwatanga
Wamu n’okubikiriza
Kuba bya mazima

hymns.title: TWEYANZIZA NNYO TWEYANZE GGE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Tweyanze, Tweyanziza
Tweyanziza nnyo, tweyanze gge x 3

1. Tukwebaza Mwaana Omulokozi waffe.
Ggwe nnyini ggulu eyakka mu nsi eno
Okuzaawo Taata, omukwano n’abantu,
Omulamuzi otubulire kate bye tulina okukola

2. Ku lwaffe, Ayi Mwaana wewaayo,
Ne bakwata ne basiba ne batwala embuga
Ne bavuma, ne bakuba, ne bajolonga ggwe
Hiii, ne bakiina, ne baseka, n’ebakuwandira amalusu
Abempi, kibooko, bikonde wamma ne bemala eggoga!

3. N’engule eya maggwa ne bakutikira Ggwe!
Omusaayi ne gutirika, nga bo bakuba bukule.
“Twala eri obwa Kabaka bwo ffe twagala Ssiza (Ceaser)”
Ne bavuma, ne bakuba, ne bajolonga ggwe
Hiii, ne bakiina, ne baseka, n’ebakuwandira amalusu

4. Engoye zo n’ebazigabana ggwe nosigalira awo!
Ku musalaba ne babamba n’okomererwa obukunya!
Era n’omusaalaba ne basiimba gw’ofe mu bulumi!
Olwo ne bakiina, ne baseka, ne bajolonga ggwe.
Hiii, n’omutima nebafumita bakakase offudde!

5. Hiii, Mwaana nga wabonabona nnyo ggwe!
Atwagala bwatyo alisangwawa, Taata.
Ye tukwebaze tutya ggwe owatununula ffe
Tukwebaze tutya Omusumba Omulungi,
Era tukwebaza tutya Ggwe atugabirira ffe.

6. Mukube engoma ne ngalabi ffe tumwebaza oyo
Haaa! Musaakanye, muzine, musanyuke, tumugulumize oyo
Eyawaayo obulamu bwe olwokubeera ffe.
Haaa! Musaakanye, muzine, musanyuke, tumugulumize oyo
Eyatuwonya Geyena n’atuggulira essanyu.

Tweyanziza nnyo, tweyanze gge x 3

hymns.title: HOSSANA ALLELUIA, MIREMBE KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Tuyimbe, Alleluia, tumusanyukire.
Kabaka afuga byonna eyetowaaza ennyo.
Bwatyo naazalibwa mu nsi e Betelemu
Mu mbeera ey’obwavu,
Mu kaalo akekusifu,
Bwatyo nakisa ekitiibwa kye Katonda!

2. Hossana, Hossana, Ayi Yezu Kabaka,
Omulokozi waffe eyakka mu nsi eno.
Okutununula mu manyo ga Sitani;
Omulimba kafulu,
Omutemu kayingo,
Owettima azikiriza emyoyo gyaffe.

3. Mukuube ebivuga, tumutendereze,
Omuzadde omulungi era ow’ekisa.
Eyajja aliise, asonyiwe abaana be;
Era abajjanjabenga,
Ababeeremu ddala,
Abajjuze obulamu, ababe siba kufa!

4. Tusinze, twebaze, tumuvunamire,
Olw’okujja naleeta eki-ta-ngaala.
Buli amukiriza aleme kuzikirira;
Nokutuyigiriza,
Ekitiibwa kye Kabaka,
Kyaweebwa mu Ggulu, ne mu nsi kimuweebwe.

5. Okujja kwe mu nsi, kwawakanyizibwa,
Erode namuyigga amutte, olw’obujja.
Tuyimbe Hossana, yawangula abalabe.
Tuyise n’ebivvulu,
Tusaakanye tuyimbe,
Hossana, Allelluia, Mirembe Kabaka

hymns.title: MUJJE MUJJE TUMUSINZE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Mujje mujje tumusinze
Kuba ye Kabaka
Afuga eggulu n’ensi
Katonda atagwawo

1. Mujje mwena tumusinze
Katonda atwagala
Yava mu ggulu nakka
Okutununula

2. Yazaalibwa mu bwavu
Nga yefudde omuntu
Abamagi beeyuna
Gyali okumusinza.

3. Abantu be abo mu nsi
Baali mu nzikiza.
Nasalawo okujja,
Omusumba Omulungi.

4. Sitaani nga yewaga,
Ng’atigomya abantu.
Najja amutugobeko
Azzewo emirembe

5. Endwadde ezo n’okufa,
Nga byebiri wonna.
Mugaati Ogw’Obulamu
Najja ebyo abijjewo.

hymns.title: SSANYU LINGI NNYO
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ssanyu lingi nnyo,
Olwa Kabaka oyo eyazalibwa,
Katumusinze,
Allelluia ye Katonda.

1. Bulijjo wabeerawo essanyu
Nga tujukira amazalibwa,
Aga Yezu Kabaka Katonda,
Eyajja mu nsi eno ku lwaffe.

2. Abamagi bajja okusinza,
Omwaana eyali azaliddwa,
Emunyenye ya bakulembera,
N’ebatuusa awali Kabaka.

3 Nga batuuse awali Omwaana,
Ne babugaana essanyu lingi
Ne bavunama ne bamusinza,
Kabaka we ggulu n’ensi.

4. Ne basumulula ebirabo,
Ne babitonera Kabaka,
Obubani, Zawaabu ne Mira,
Nga babiretedde Kabaka.

5. Yezu Kabaka tukwebaza,
Olwokujja okutununula,
Essanyu eryajjula Abamagi
Tusaba naffe litujjule.

hymns.title: TUSANYUKE TUJAGUZE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Tusanyuke, tujaguze,
Katonda ddala,
Kabaka afuga eggulu n’ensi,
Yakka eno munsi okutuwonya
Okuzikirira, atuwe obulamu.

1. Ng’essanyu lingi Yezu Kabaka ,
Ng’ensi yonna ekuza amazalibwa go
Ayi Katonda waffe ng’otudiddemu,
Ng’ozze okunoonya endiga ozirokole.
2. Ayi Omulokozi ekitangaala,
Wajja munsi tuve mu kizikiza,
Twalinga mu mannyo ga Sitaani,
Omulimba kafulu era omutemu.

3. Ayi Omulamuzi ow’obwenkanya,
Wajja otuyigirize ennamula yo
Era omuntu yenna akukiriza,
Aleme okusingibwa omusango.

4. Wazalibwa mu nsi kutumanyisa,
Ekitiibwa kyo ddala ekya Kabaka
Ffe nno tukikuwe ayi Omutonzi.
Nawe otuwe obutuuze mu ggulu lyo.

hymns.title: TUSANYUKE TUYIMBE ALLELLUIA (AMAZALIBWA)
hymns.content:
1. Tusanyuke tuyimbe.................Alleluia
Katonda yakka ku nsi..............,.Alleluia
Naazalibwa ng’omuntu............ Alleluia
Nakisa ekitiibwa kye...............Alleluia

2. Ekyamuleeta mu nsi................Alleluia
Kuzzaawo omukwano ............Alleluia
Eri oyo buli yenna..................Alleluia
Akwata ebigambo bye..............Alleluia

3. Amusonyiwa ebibi...................Alleluia
Namuwonya n’endwadde..........Alleluia
Amuwa obulamu....................Alleluia
Na buli kyeyetaaga..................Alleluia

4. Era amubeeramu.....................Alleluia
Namuwa emirembe gye.............Alleluia
Amutwaala mu Ggulu...............Alleluia
Namuwa ne kitiibwa................Alleluia

5. Gguno ddala mukwaano............Alleluia
Tewali kigwenkana..................Alleluia
Kyetuva tusanyuka..................Alleluia
Nga tukuza amajja ge...............Alleluia

hymns.title: WONNA SSANYU
hymns.content:
1. Wonna ssanyu, ssanyu, ssanyu,
Mu nsi ne mu Ggulu.
Wonna wonna kusanyuka
Wonna wonna kujaguza,
Buli lwetukuza amajja ga Kabaka,
Okunoonya abaana be abalokole.

2. Twali tuli mu nzikiza
Ekitangaala najja,
Nayigiriza amazima,
Wamma abantu nebawona
Sitaani naagobwa, emirembe gyaddawo
Hossan Alleluia, Yezu Kabaka.

3. Yezu Kabaka Omulokozi,
Tumuvunamire
Tumusinze oyo Kabaka, tukwate n’ebigambo bye
Tumutendereze,
Oba bukya bukye
Nga twebaza okwagala kwa Katonda!

4. Wonna sanyu, sanyu, sanyu,
Mu nsi ne mu Ggulu.
Wcnna wonna kusanyuka, kuba Omwaana wa Katonda,
Eyefuula omuntu,
Ddala ali mu ffe,
Tatwabuliranga Yezu Kabaka.

hymns.title: HOSSANA HOSSANA YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ave Ave Yezu Kabaka
Hossana Hossana wa ggulu eyo.

1. Yeruzalemu, yiino yonna ewuuma.
Bonna bazze okumwaniriza,
Oyo Kabaka omuyinza wa byonna;
2. Wuuno atuuse, Kabaka Omuteefu,
Yebagadde endogoyi.
Alleluia tumusanyukire;

3. Ezo engoye, kwaba atambulira
Namatabi tumunyenyeze,
Tumuyimbire oluyimba lw’essanyu:

4. Mujje mulabe, awonya endwadde
Nazukiza n’abafudde!
Tumweyune atuwe obulamu;

5. Wuuno ddala, Kabaka wa byonna,
N’eyo enyanja emuwulira,
Kibuyaga n’emyoyo emigwagwa;

6. Ddala ye wuuyo, Omusumba Omulungi
Ayigiriza eby’amazima,
Tumukirize y’anatulokola;

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA AYINGIRA YERUZALEMU MU KITIIBWA
hymns.content:
1. Yazuukiza Lazaro!!
Kati nno tumatidde
Ono ye Kristu ddala
Kabaka wa Israel
Omwaana wa Katonda
Ggwe twalinda obwedda.

2. “Yenna anzikiriza,
Ne bwafa aba mulamu;
N’omulamu talifa,
Emirembe n’emirembe”
KUZUKIRA, BULAMU!
Ono ddala Katonda

3. Tumwalirewo engoye
Ye kwaba atambulira
Tunyenye n’amatabi
Twanirize Kabaka
Omwana wa Katonda
Kabaka wa Israel.

4. Kabaka Omuteefu
Yebagadde endogoyi
Wuuno awonya endwadde
N’agoba ne Sitaani
Aleeta n’emirembe
Nazuukiza n’abafu!

5. Hossana! Halleluia!
Abantu ne bayimba
Hossana Yezu Kabaka
Omulokozi waffe.
Ekibuga kyawuuma
Olwa Kabaka Omuteefu

hymns.title: TUGULUMIZE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Tugulumize Yezu Kabaka,
Katonda waffe owa mazima,
Yakka mu nsi okutununula,
Neyewaayo nabonabona;
Yanyomebwa, nakubibwa, eno nga bamusekerera
Nebamutikira amaggwa, era ne ba mukomerera.

2. Tugulumize Yezu Kabaka,
Lino lye tteeka lya Kitaffe,
Bwonyooma Mwaana oba onyoomye ye.
Bwolaba Mwaana oba olabye ye.
Baamugaya, nakwatibwa, era ne bamubonyabonya;
Nayambulwamu n’engoye era ne bamukomerera.

3. Tugulumize Yezu Kabaka,
Kabaka afuga e Ggulu ne nsi.
Kino kye kyamuleeta mu nsi;
Okutumanyisa amazima.
Baamwambaza omunagiro omumyufu nebamukuba
Ne bamutikira amaggwa, eno ng’abamukudalira.

4. Tugulumize Yezu Kabaka,
Omugaati Ogw’obulamu,
Yajja okuwa ensi eno obulamu,
Era nokujjawo olumbe
Baamugaana, naakubibwa, era ne bamukomerera,
Ne bamusogga n’effumu, bakakase nti afudde awedde!

5. Tugulumize Yezu Kabaka,
Nyini buyinza eyazuukira
Nakakasa abamukiriza,
Nti ye Katonda nnyini bulamu
Tu mutenderezenga nnyo, tumwagale, tumusinze,
Era tu mukirize nnyo, tumwesige atwagala bwatyo.

hymns.title: YEWAAYO
hymns.content:
Chorus: Alleluia, Alleluia,
Bamutta nga baduula,
“Vva ku musalaba okke wansi, tulyoke tukirize nti yeggwe
Kabaka; era obanga oli Mwaana wa Patri, katulabe obanga
anajja akuwonye.”
Kale....
Tumukirize, tumusinze, tumugulumizenga,
Tumwagalenga nannyo kuba ye Mutonzi
Kabaka wa byonna.

1. Yewaayo ne bavuma, yenna ne bakuba,
kyokka nga tanyega muntu.
Omusumba Omulungi nafirira endiga ze
ziwone okuzikirira.
Kale...
2. Eky’okuba Omwaana wa Patri,
era nga Kabaka tebakikiriza.
Baaluka engule eya amaggwa
Gye bamutikira okumukudalira.
Kale...

3. Yetikka omusalaba eno nga bakuba,
agende bamukomerere.
Yasogwa ne ffumu mu mutima gwe
Okukakasa nti afudde awedde.
Kale...

4. Basaako ku ntana ye ejjinja
N’abaserikale balabe amujjamu,
Alleluia, mujaguze, Kabaka,
Yazuukira era yalituzukiza.

Kale;-
Tumukirize, tumusinze, tumugulumizenga,
Tumwagalenga nannyo kuba ye Mutonzi
Kabaka wa byonna.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA YABONABONA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka yabonabona
Nga yewadde ng’omutango
Okununula abaana be,
Abo abamukiriza.

2. Omutume omulyakuzi,
Yamuwayo mu balabe
Bamukwata n’atwalibwa
Ng’omusiibe ewa Kayafa.

3. N’atwalibwa ewa Pilato
Nakakasa nti ye Kabaka
Nanyomebwa, n’akubibwa
Naasalirwa ogw’okuttibwa

4. Baamutika Omusalaba
Ogw’omuti omuzito
Nagutuusa ku Kalivario
Era n’agugalamirako.

5. Baamukomerera enninga
Mu bibatu mu bigere
Ne basimba omusalaba
Bwatyo naafa mu bulumi.

hymns.title: TUMUSINZE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Tumusinze Yezu Kabaka,
Yatufirira ffena
Era tumuwe ekitiibwa
Ye Kabaka we ggulu n’ensi.

1. Tumusinze Yezu Kabaka
Omwaana wa Katonda
Eyajja mu nsi ku lwaffe
Okununula abonoonyi.

2. Baamukwata nebamutta,
Nnaazikibwa mu ntaana,
Naye nalaga obuyinza,
Nabawangula nazukira.

3. Maria Magadalena
Yakeera ku ntaana ye,
Nabuuza “Bamutaddewa?”
Yezu Kabaka namweyoleka.

4. Omukama namutuma
Eri abayigirizwa be
Nti bagende e Galilaya,
Eyo gyebanamusanga.

5. Bwe bamulaba Katonda,
Baavunama baamusinza,
Abamu baabusabusa,
Yezu Kabaka nabatuma.

6. Mugende muyigirize,
Amawanga ggonna,
Nga mubatiza abantu,
Bakwate bye nabalagira

hymns.title: TUSANYUKE TUYIMBE ALLELLUIA (MAZUKIRA)
hymns.content:
1. Tusanyuke, tuyimbe.................Alleluia
Yezu Kabaka yazukira..............,Alleluia
Nakakasa ensi yonna..................Alleluia
Nti ye nyini bulamu..................Alleluia

2. Yajja okutumanyisa..................Alleluia
Bwe beyisa mu Ggulu...............Alleluia
Tubiteeke mu nkola..................Alleluia
Atutwale mu Ggulu..................Alleluia

3. Kyokka ensi yabigaana.............Alleluia
Yakubwa, yanyomebwa............Alleluia
Nebamukomerera....................Alleluia
Naafa era naazikibwa...............Alleluia

4. Yawaayo obulamu bwe.............Alleluia
Tufune ebigambo bye.................Alleluia
N’olwekyo tubikwate... .............Alleluia
Twanukule omukwano...............Alleluia

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA YA TUNUNULA
hymns.content:
1. Tuyimuse amaloboozi
Nga twaniriza Kabaka
Eyava mu ntaana
Naswaaza abalabe
Yeddiza obulamu
Kuba ye Katonda

Chorus: Hossana Allelluia Yezu Kabaka

2. Maria Magadalena
Nabakazi abalala
Baakera ku ntaana
Nebasanga njerere
Malaika n’abagamba
Yezu Kabaka azukidde

Chorus: Hossana Allelluia Yezu Kabaka

3. Yezu Kabaka yalabika
Magadalena n’amusinza
Najjula essanyu
Okulaba Omukama
Kabaka n’amutuma
Eri abatume be.

Chorus: Hossana Allelluia Yezu Kabaka

4. Tusanyuke tujaguze
Kabaka ya tununula
Yeewayo ku lwaffe
Mu bulumi obungi ennyo
Ffe tufune ebigambo
Tuwone omuliro.

Chorus: Hossana Allelluia Yezu Kabaka

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA YAZUKIRA ( BAKABONA BALINA OBUJJA)
hymns.content:
1. Pilato ffe tuwe abakuumi,
Bakuume entana ye tusseeko n’oguyinja
Tulabe nno amujjamu,
Yaga - mba - ku - lwesatu
Ajja - Kuzu - kira,
Tulabe obulimba bwe.

2. Ku lw’essatu yazukira.
Maria Omwenenyi,
Nabakazi abalala
Bakeera mu matulutulu,
Enta – ana -nga -njerere!
Alle – luia - Kabaka ,
Yali nga azzukidde..

3. Ne balaba Malayika
Nabagamba nti
Mmwe nno muleke kutya,
Yezu Kabaka azukidde
Alle- lu- ia - Kabaka
Hossana - Kabaka - Hossana
Ogulumizibwe Kabaka..

4. Maria nabuuza gweyasingaana
Mukama wange akisidwa
Luyi ki mu nnimiro?
Maria nze Omulokozi
Alle- lu- ia - Kabaka
Hossana - Kabaka - Hossan

5. Yezu Kabaka okuzukira
Ly’essanyu lyaffe ffenna
Naffe ali tuzukiza
Tumweyune Omulokozi
Alle- lu- ia - Kabaka
Hossana - Kabaka - Hossana
Ogulumizibwe Kabaka.

hymns.title: MIREMBE MWOYO MUTUKIRIVU
hymns.content:
1. Mirembe Mwoyo Mutukirivu
Katonda waffe omwagalwa;
Nnyini buyinza n’obutukuvu,

Ggwe Kabaka. Ggwe Kabaka
Ggwe osibuka mu Patri Kabaka,
Ng’oli ddala kimu naye;
Era nga Ggwe ne Yezu Kabaka,
Muli kimu ddala mwenna.

2. Ggwe atuvvunulira ebya Mwaana,
Omuwolereza ow’emyoyo,
Ffe abaana bo tuwanjaga gyoli,
Omutukuza, Omukubagiza

Tukwebaza n’olwo kutuzaala
Ogwo kubiri mu batisimu;
Era n’olwo kutusonyiwanga
Ebibi byaffe Ayi Katonda.

3. Tusaba obu-yinza obw’okukwata,
Era n’okubissa mu nkola
Ebigambo bya Yezu Kabaka,
Twagalane, Ayi Kabaka.

Obusungu, obuseegu, obulimba
N’obukuusa obwo, bitujjemu
Tukusaba otuwe n’enyonta,
Enyingi enno ey’obutukirivu.

4. Tusaba otuwe okukwagala ennyo,
N’okukiriza okwa maanyi;
Ojje otuberemu, Ayi Kabaka
Tujulirenga Yezu Kabaka.

N’ebikolwa byonna byeyakola
Nebisingawo tubikole;
Ekitiibwa kye kibune wonna
Essanyu lyo litubukale.

Mirembe Mwoyo Mutukirivu
Katonda waffe omwagalwa;
Nnyini buyinza n’obutukuvu,
Ggwe Kabaka. Ggwe Kabaka

hymns.title: MWOYO MUTUKIRIVU KATONDA OWA MAZIMA
hymns.content:
1. Ayi Mwoyo Mutukirivu,
Tukusinza, tukutenda.
Era tukugulumiza,
Katonda owa mazima.

Osibuka mu Kitaffe
So ate ng’oli kimu naye;
Era Ggwe ne Yezu Kabaka
Muli kimu ddala ddala.

2. Ggwe ensibuko y’obuyinza,
Obulamu n’amagezi
Eyatonda byonna byonna
Kabaka we ggulu ne nsi

Ggwe ensibuko y’okwagala
Emirembe wamu n’essanyu;
Era nnyini butukirivu
Atusonyiwa ebibi.

3. Ye Ggwe Omuyigiriza,
Avunula ebya Mwaana;
Otujjukiza ebigambo,
N’otumanyisa ebirijja

Ojja n’okugulumiza,
N’okujjuliranga Mwaana;
Ate Ggwe Omukubagiza
Era Omuwolereza.

4. Abakiririza mu Mwaana,
Bwe baba babatizibwa;
Obazaala ogw’okubiri
Ne bafuuka abaana bo.

Ate era owemukiriza,
Ensi olw’obutakiriza
N’olwo okusingibwa omusango
N’olwo obutukirivu.

5. Ayi Mwoyo Mutukirivu
Ggwe Katonda owa Mazima
Tukwesiga, tukwagala
Tukusaba otusasire.

Otuwe okwagala Mwaana
Okutalimu bukuusa;
N’okukwaata ebigambo bye
Era n’obutamugaya.

6. Tukusaba otutukuze
Otulire ddala mu ffe;
Tujjulirenga Yezu Kabaka
Mu mawanga gonna mu nsi.

Etendo libe eri Mwaana,
N’eri Mwoyo owa Mazima,
N’eri Kitaffe Kabaka,
Emirembe ne mirembe.

hymns.title: AYI KATONDA PATRI KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Ayi Katonda Patri Kabaka,
Tukusinza, tukutenda;
Era tukugulumiza,
Ggwe Kabaka
Ggwe Kwagala

Ebintu byonna ye Ggwe eyabitonda
Ggwe nnyini buyinza, Kabaka,
Omutukirivu Omutiibwa;
Owe kitiibwa
Ekitakoma.

2. Mwaana ne Mwoyo owa Mazima,
Basibuka mu Ggwe bonna;
Era nga mwenna mufanana,
Mwenna mwenna,
Muli kimu.

Ye Ggw’ensibuko ey’obulamu bwonna,
Emirembe n’essanyu, Kabaka,
Osukkulumye n’okutegeera
Obulungi bwo,
Tebukoma.

3. Ayi Omuyinza Nantalemwa,
Tukwebaza, tukutenda,
Olw’okutununula
Ggwe watuma,
Yezu Kabaka

Twebaza n’okutuwaayo eri Mwaana,
Mwaana atulokole mu bibi;
Atuwe n’obulamu obutagwaawo,
Tujje gyoli,
Mu kwesiima.

4. Ayi Kitaawe wa Yezu Kabaka,
Tukwagala, tukwesiga,
Mu linnya lya Yezu Kabaka,
Tukusaba
Otuwe bino;

Tusaba twagale nnyo Yezu Kabaka,
Tumuwe ekitiibwa, Kabaka,
Tukwate n’ebiragiro bye byonna,
Otubereemu,
Ennaku zonna.

hymns.title: AYI KITAFFE TUKWEBAZA
hymns.content:
1. Nkusinze ntya nkwagale ntya Ayi Patri Kabaka?!
Ggwe eyatonda eggulu n’ensi, ensibuko ya byonna.
Katonda amasamasa, nnyini butukuvu,
Omuyinza, omutiibwa, ensulo y’okwagala.

2. Watutonda mu bbala lyo, mu kwagala okungi;
Notuwa buli kinno omu ku bitone byo Ggwe.
Omuntu bwe yakusobya tewamwabulira,
Edda nga otuma Abalanzi eri abantu bo.

3. Bwe walaba nga bigaanyi, ng’omuntu ayongeera
Okwonoona n’osalawo notuma Omwaana wo.
Omwaaana wo omu ati ddala, bwe muli ekimu,
Yakka mu nsi naazalibwa okutununula.

4. Kabaka oyo Omulamuzi yatuyigiriza,
Byonna byonna by’oyagala, tufuuke abaana bo.
Kyoka ensi eno yabigaana n’emubonyabonya;
Yakwaatibwa, naavumibwa, naakubwa n’attibwa.

5. Omwaana wo ng’ azuukidde, tewatwabulira,
Otuma Mwoyo wo najja eri abamwagala.
Ayi Kitaffe tukwebaza olw’okwagala kwo;
Ggwe oyatuwa Omwaana wo, n’otuwa Mwoyo wo.

hymns.title: ENSI BWE BAKYAWANGA
hymns.content:
1. Eno ensi kwe muli
Bweba nga ebakyaaye
Mumanye nga nze gwe yasooka
Temuli ba nsi
Nnabajja mu be nsi
Ensi nno kwe ku bakyawa.

Chorus:
Naye mmwe nno aboluganda
Temutya mu beere nange,
Nze ensi nnagiwangula
Mu nywererenga nno ku nze

2. Omuddu takira
Mukama we
Byebankola namwe mu birinde
Bali nno mu kibi
Akyawa nze
Ab’akyaye ne Kitange

Chorus:
Naye mmwe nno aboluganda
Temutya mu beere nange,
Nze ensi nnagiwangula
Mu nywererenga nno ku nze

3. Mwoyo Owa Mazima
Ava mu Kitange
Ggwe ndituma alinjulira
Era namwe bwe mutyo
Mulinjulira
Okuva edda muli nange

Chorus:
Naye mmwe nno aboluganda
Temutya mu beere nange,
Nze ensi nnagiwangula
Mu nywererenga nno ku nze
Yeeeeee,
Mu nywererenga nno ku nze

hymns.title: TULINA OKUTEEKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ayi Yezu Kabaka
Omuteefu tusaba,
Otufuule abateefu
Ate era abetowaze.
Tusaba otuyambe
Tukwate ebigambo byo.

1. Yezu Kabaka waffe
Muteefu, mwetowaze;
Okubeera ababe,
Tulina okuteeka.

2. Obuteefu eba mbeera
Yo mwoyo no mubiri,
Omuntu agifuna,
Nga akutte ebiragiro.

3. Omuntu omwetowaze
Abeera muwulize;
Tayagala bitiibwa
Ayagala Katonda.

4. Obusungu bubi nnyo,
Bwebutta obuteefu,
Leka okwegulumiza,
Kwe kutta obwetowaze

hymns.title: FOREVER I CONFESS I BELIEVE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Forever and ever
I confess I believe
Forever and ever x 3

1. Jesus the King you said - “I am the way, the truth, the life.’
Whoever has seen me - he has seen the Father
And the Father is in me - and I am in the Father”
On the strength – of these words – I proclaim you my God

Chorus: Forever and ever.......... x3

2, "You are right in saying I am a King - for this reason I was born,
And for this I came into the world - to testify to the truth.
All the authority above in heaven - and on earth is given to me.”
On the strength - of these words – Behold my beloved King

Chorus: Forever and ever.......... x3

3. "I am telling you the truth - that I am the gate for the sheep.
All who came before me - were thieves and were robbers,
Whoever enters through me - will surely indeed be saved
On the strength - of these words – Behold my Good Shepherd

Chorus: Forever and ever.......... x3
